bill_title: provide for certain revisions in the Criminal Code Revision Commission bill.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for certain revisions in the Criminal Code Revision Commission bill. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. In any felony imposed pursuant to any title of the South Dakota Codified Laws other than Title 22, the court may, in sentencing, consider whether the prosecution has established mens rea. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
